alert.note: Alert for Baker County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 1:43PM PDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Baker County through 215 PM PDT... At 143 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Sumpter, or 23 miles west of Baker City, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Sumpter around 150 PM PDT. Mount Ruth around 210 PM PDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
